title:
Spatial-to-Temporal Orbital Angular Momentum Mapping in Twisted Light
  Fields
authors: Vijay Kumar and Purnesh Singh Badavath
abstract:
Optical angular momentum (OAM) in light beams is manifested as the
two-dimensional spatial distribution of its complex amplitude, necessitating a
2D detector for its measurement. Here we present a novel speckle-based machine
learning approach for OAM recognition, which enables recognition using a 1-D
array detector or even a 0-D single-pixel detector.
